name: festmap
description: A very lightweight map for planning the layout of events.

scripts.build: npm run rollup && npm run uglify
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs dist/festmap-src.js -c -m -o dist/festmap.js --source-map filename=dist/festmap.js.map --source-map content=dist/festmap-src.js.map --source-map url=festmap.js.map --comments

author: HaDiKo e.V.
